{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = MSI |model = US310EX |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 18, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/MSI_US310EX |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = micro dongle |vendor_id = 0bda |device_id = 8171 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188SU; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 04/18/2011 |estprice = |upc = 816909059502 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004X69XH8 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per the product page, this is a 1T1R dongle. The drivers provided by '''MSI''' are RTL81xxSU drivers, so this device is presumed to use RTL8188SU.. as well as the default 8188SU USB ID (no custom USB IDs are found in the driver). Additional specifications, per the product page, follow... *Dimensions (L x W x H): [[Dimensions::1.30" x 0.67" x 0.28"]] *Weight: [[Weight::0.20 oz]] ==Links of Interest== [http://faenl.msi.com/index.php?dir=Networking/US310EX/ Driver]
[http://1887047.sites.myregisteredsite.com/index.php?func=proddesc&maincat_no=131&prod_no=2121 Product page (on a non-'''MSI''' domain)] ==Vendor links== [http://www.tigerdirect.com/applications/SearchTools/item-details.asp?EdpNo=306287 On '''TigerDirect'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
